description: A farm with rooms, a spa, a bistro and a gourmet restaurant! At the latter, enjoy regional cuisine with a creative twist added by the chef, on two tasting menus that can be modified as required. Don’t miss the chocolate soufflé served with hazelnut ice cream and caramel sauce. The farm’s own produce can also be purchased here.
facilitiesServices: ['Air conditioning', 'Car park', 'Garden or park', 'Great view', 'Terrace', 'Wheelchair access']
